* Desmonus watched through her scanners as the battle between the Alliance 
and some unknown force too place. Wondering just what those fools were 
trying to do, attacking a force such as the Alliance and actually hoping 
they'de win?
However, although she would love to join in on the fun, she knew that she 
was far to weak to be any use to her master and his crew. However, as she 
scanned the field outdoors she made notes on whom her prey would be, but 
even as she looked her stomach rumbled.
Desmonus sighed and turned her senses away from the battle, knowing that it 
would only tempt her to join in in order to feed...and ruin her cover.
She couldn't let the others know, know that her only food source was 
mech-fluid. If they found out they could kill her, or never go near her and 
never give her the chance to actually feed upon something.
So, it would remain her little secret.
Desmonus hissed quietly as she turned from the scene and glided effertlessly 
into the shadows, waiting for the battle to cease...and her feast to begin.*
